snippet: The strongest looks were combinations of black and white, which the trendsetters wore in a way that’s quite different from the style of their counterparts in the city.
abstract: Bill Cunningham observes that strongest clothing trend among shoppers in New York City over Thanksgiving weekend were combinations of black and white.
lead_paragraph: The strongest looks were combinations of black and white, which the trendsetters wore in a way that’s quite different from the style of their counterparts in the city.

keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: Far East, South and Southeast Asia and Pacific Areas
